segments.text: I need to order new business cards .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Do you have any idea how many you'd like ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Would you fill out this form , please ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I don't want to make any changes to my old card .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: If you detect any difference , I'll take you out to dinner .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: ... Okay , that's it . Here's the form , and here's my old card to use as a model .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thank you . Your order will be ready seven days from now .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I need it sooner . Let me have it in three days , okay ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We can certainly give you faster turnaround , but it will cost you extra .
segments.speaker: S2
